owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your recent visit to Asiana Hotel Dubai. We appreciate you taking the time to review your experience.

We are delighted to read your positive comments about our hotel team. It is wonderful to hear that their dedication and service excellence made a lasting impression on you. We take great pride in ensuring that every guest has a memorable stay, and your feedback reinforces our efforts.

We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future.

Best regards,
Asiana  Hotel Dubai
owner_response.author: Asiana Grand Hotel

data.text: Great experience everytime i check into this beautiful hotel. Highly professional and hospitable staffs always there to cater my extra needs. Special thanks to Mr. Sanjeeb for arranging travel itineraries. Also thanks to Mr. Purna dai for always being a helping hand.
data.title: Best hotel in dubai

data.text: Front office SANJIB is very good, friendly and helpful...even tough we regular are customer of this hotel I found service of the restaurant is quite disappointing. Hope to see positive changes in future and they retain their loyal customers

Asiana Hotel Dubai

data.text: Our Gusan Construction has seminars in Dubai. All of our higher officials are stay in Asiana Hotel. We had a great experience. And of course the man Mr Sanjib assists us in so many ways during stay. Thank you Mr Sanjib.. See you on July brother.
data.title: Wonderful Experience
